sections.purpose: To determine paw volume using a plethysmometer for inflammation studies.
sections.scope: Applicable to experimental pharmacology studies in the Pharmacology laboratory.
procedure: Fill the plethysmometer cell with appropriate fluid.
Gently immerse the animal paw up to the marked level.
Remove the paw and wipe gently.
Switch OFF the instrument after use.
sections.precautions: Avoid injury to the animal. Maintain cleanliness of the fluid cell.
